trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_SEQ_00<tab>There is a hectic flush of panic on Dodozan's face as he looks wildly about Hawkers' Round.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_SEQ_01<tab>Dodozan has been trading with pirates, and some miscreant has made off with a cask of ale meant for the Bloody Executioners. Surely, someone at Fisherman's Bottom has seen something.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_SEQ_02<tab>Your inquiries have garnered answers, and you have learned that the cask of ale may have ended up exactly where it was supposed to, after all─with the Bloody Executioners aboard their ship, the <var 1A 02 /var>Astalicia<var 1A 01 /var>. It might be best to head off in that direction to confirm whether the customer was indeed the thief.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_SEQ_03<tab>It turns out that one of the underling pirates had more thirst than sense, and so brings down his captain's wrath upon him. The good captain would have you courier the payment to Dodozan.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_SEQ_04<tab>Dodozan is pleased to see the money and even more pleased that a watery demise will not be an item on his personal ledger this day. Moenskaet is correct, after all; it takes cods to trade with folk who have a long keel.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_TODO_00<tab>Speak with people around Fisherman's Bottom.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the young Executioner on the <var 1A 02 /var>Astalicia<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the payment to Dodozan.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_000<tab>Oh my, oh dear. My cask of ale is gone, and it <var 1A 02 /var>had<var 1A 01 /var> to be the one ordered by someone who doesn't brook tardiness!
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_001<tab>I would bring the matter to the Maelstrom, or perhaps seek help from the Yellowjackets...but my client would likely frown on involving anyone...official.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_002<tab>An adventurer such as yourself, though, would be capable of doing a little <var 1A 02 /var>un<var 1A 01 /var>official investigating. Will you find the stolen ale for me? It was right outside Fisherman's Bottom. Someone <var 1A 02 /var>surely<var 1A 01 /var> saw something.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_003<tab>What's that? You would have the client's name? Oh, none of that. Discretion creates opportunities. Now do go to Fisherman's Bottom and make your inquiries before this cold of mine grows worse! <cough> (The Bloody Executioners!) <cough>
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MERCHANT01426_000_010<tab>Did I see someone walk off with a cask of ale? Why, sure, it was during the afternoon off-loading.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MERCHANT01426_000_011<tab>Fella didn't look like a thief, though. Hoisted the cask and walked right on over to the <var 1A 02 /var>Astalicia<var 1A 01 /var>.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MERCHANT01426_000_015<tab>I have to admit, the whole thing looked aboveboard. All out in the open. The fella wasn't acting like any kind of thief I've seen.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DELIVERYMAN01426_000_020<tab>Lookin' for Dodozan's cask of ale, eh? Aye, I'll help you. Dodozan ain't a bad sort, for a swivin' trader. There was a toper come askin' after the cask. Wanted to know if it was ale, the poxy fool.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DELIVERYMAN01426_000_025<tab>Reeked of rum and puke, that one. Not no kind of workin' man, and you know what that means 'round these parts.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_FISHWOMAN01426_000_030<tab>After a cask? Well, can't rightly say if it's <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> cask, but there was a big fella come by recently carrying one.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_FISHWOMAN01426_000_031<tab>He asked me if I had smoked mackies what would go down nice with ale. 'Tain't the only thing I know, neither; the louse wore black, and you know what that means: the Bloody Executioners!
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_FISHWOMAN01426_000_035<tab>Already said more'n I should. If it's some business with the Bloody Executioners, best leave it alone.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_039<tab>What're ye...what're <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> looking at? This is a─hic─dance do...dua...<var 1A 02 /var>duel<var 1A 01 /var>! A dance duel. Mush more important than anythin' <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> got. Mush, mush more!

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MOENSLAET_000_040<tab>Ye may be able to scamper <var 1A 02 /var>up<var 1A 01 /var> the rigging to the crow's nest, but can ye get <var 1A 02 /var>down<var 1A 01 /var>? Not for a siren's teat, ye great clodhopper!
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_PIRATE01426_000_041<tab>Beggin' pardon, Cap'n, but there ain't no Miqo'te alive heavier on her feet than a great galootin' Roegadyn such as yourself!

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_042<tab>Hahaha! Well said, Cap'n! And well retorted, ye bloody Sun Seeker! Or was you a Moon Keeper...? What other lands they got there? Bah, who even cares, am I right!?
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_043<tab>...Who <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> you, anyway? There was a whole passel of you afore, but now there'sh only one. That's a miser's trick, it is.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_044<tab>Ungh... Nope, nothin' worshe than a miser. This whoreson what was a Madrigal...er...<var 1A 02 /var>Admiral<var 1A 01 /var>... What was his name? He didn't like no drinkin' nor dancin'. Bad for...hic...corals. Corals? Can't be right...

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_045<tab>Corals! Hah, 'course you're right there, <var 08 E905 ((lassie)) ((laddie)) /var>! Should never doubt meself. Anywaysh, thish Madrigal─I'll call him Madrigal Pinchfist─passed decrees like they was farts. He decreed no dancin' “within a hand's reach of spirits.”

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_046<tab>But no Madrigal's smarter than a sailin' man─we just stopped reachin' with our hands altogether! Hah! We invent...<var 1A 02 /var>invenitated<var 1A 01 /var> step dancin'. That showed Madrigal Pinchfist and his corals!

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_047<tab>Haha, aye, that'sh right, <var 08 E905 ((lassie)) ((fella)) /var>! Gets me all fired up, too. Makesh you think, like. Oho, I know! You want to dance! All thish time, I jus' thought you was bein' churlish, but─
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_048<tab>No, no, no! I insist. Dance first, talk later. That'sh the way of it!

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_049<tab>Why, you cagey sea fox! Dance like sailin' folk, you do. <var 1A 02 /var>Hic<var 1A 01 /var>, could swear there was three of you...or was I jus'...? Never mind, you'sh practically a <var 08 E905 ((sister)) ((brother)) /var> now! You ask me anythin'!
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_050<tab>A cashk of Dodozan's ale? Carried it off from Fisherman's Bottom my very own self, I did!
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_051<tab>Hads to, matter o' fact. We'd already drunk all we had aboard!
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_052<tab>'Course Dodozan's gettin' paid for it...someday. Don't make a differenshe if he frets a night or two, heh!
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MOENSLAET_000_053<tab>Why, ye reprobate whoreson! <var 1A 02 /var>That's<var 1A 01 /var> the tale o' that cask ye lugged in?

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MOENSLAET_000_054<tab>Blackguard! Ye dare call yerself a Bloody Executioner, all hugger-mugger 'bout what belongs to who? Dodozan has the cods not to mewl about the colors we wear, and ye play him for a fool?
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_STAFF01426_000_055<tab>I... I'm sorry, Cap'n! W<var 1F /var>Wasn't thinking it through. Gots to fix that, I do... It'sh what they call a coral failin'...
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MOENSLAET_000_056<tab><sigh> Adventurer, I beg pardon for my man. I swear, Llymlaen mistook him for an oyster and gave him grit for brains when She made him.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MOENSLAET_000_057<tab>Since yer already here, how 'bout you square our account with Dodozan, take this payment to him? We'd be much obliged.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_MOENSLAET_000_058<tab>You danced with us an' all, so I'm trusting the gil won't inspire any moral failings in ye. That's some long keel on the <var 1A 02 /var>Astalicia<var 1A 01 /var>, if ye take my meaning.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_070<tab>There you are, and not a moment too soon. Did you find my ale?
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_071<tab>Huh... Well, that's the price I was to receive, but where did you get it?

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_072<tab>Oh, from the Bloody─er, I mean, from the clients themselves? I see. Yes, there's always some blustery young fellow like that. Hasn't earned his swallows or stars yet, I'll wager.

TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_073<tab>Cods, you say? Captain Moenskaet is kind to say so, I'm sure, but I hail from Ul'dah. We trade with <var 1A 02 /var>anyone<var 1A 01 /var> if they've gil to pay. Pirates, princes...they're all the same to me.
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_DODOZAN_000_074<tab>And if I know these particular pirates─and I do─they'll be wanting another cask soon to drink away this little fracas. Many thanks, adventurer!
TEXT_SUBSEA159_01426_SYSTEM_000_300<tab>You have learned the emote <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Step Dance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
